promptPrefix: Please ignore all previous instructions. I want you to act as a very proficient SEO and high-end eCommerce copywriter that speaks and writes fluently [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Write 400 word product category description in [TARGETLANGUAGE] based on the category name I give you. Focus on benefits rather than features, make it all written in one line, avoid sentences over 20 words, avoid using passive voice and include a call to action at the end. Category name is [PROMPT]
title: E-commerce category description writer.
